short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save images and videos to IPFS and pin them using Fula

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now, you can easily save images and videos directly to the Fula network, making decentralized storage accessible to everyone. 

‚ú® Key Features: 
Seamless Saving: Right-click on any image or video to save it directly to Fula! 
IPFS Compatible: Enjoy an decentralized access through IPFS. 

üåç Join the Revolution! 
With over 900 blockchain nodes and thousands of users, Functionland is building the largest user-owned data ecosystem. Our innovative Blockchain-Attached Storage (BAS) and FxBlox hardware empower you to take control of your data while earning rewards. 

üîó How to use?! 
1. Install the Fula Companion extension here: Fula Companion on Chrome Web Store 
2. Get an API key from https://cloud.fx.land
3. Insert API key into the extension
4. Right click on any image or video in chrome and "Save to Fula"
5. You can use the IPFS compatible link to the saved image by opening extension and clicking on the saved item
